title: Skip waiting for stats when game should start
body:
Hi,

after champselect when my game should be starting i directly get thrown into the "Skip waiting for stats" screen.
The game is then counted as a leave from my side.
I get LOW PRIORITY QUE BECAUSE OF THIS!

There are already so many other prople askign the same question but no one of Riots members is replying anything!

FIX THIS

Edit: i even got demoted because of this - are u fcking serious

replies.body: d e u t s c h e s  F o r u m
d a s i s t n i c h t h i l f r e i c h
Hat den Fehler bei mir nicht beheben kÃ¶nnen.
